Marriage equality

Access to marriage should be equal.

  • Details of votes

These are the divisions (votes in Australia’s Parliament) that related to the policy “Marriage equality”. Compare how a supporter of the policy would have voted to the division outcome.

Supporters vote “Aye”

About the Project

The Public Whip is brought to you by the not-for-profit OpenAustralia Foundation. It is based on the UK site of the same name.

If you'd like to talk to us about the project, please email us.
